name: Eden Apple
description:
Hello, this is Code Site again with a new and nice game for the paint jam 2021. This is a catcher kind of game. In this game, our character billy catches Eden Apples. I know that it is a thingy from Assasin's Creed Bloodlines. I added it, so it would be nice. It is like a flappy bird game. You would need to be using your arrow keys and move the Eden apple in such a way that it is cought by billy who is moving left and right inside the game.

Space Bar --> To make Eden Apple jump in air 

Arrow Keys:

Left Arrow Key --> Move Left 

Right Arrow Key --> Move Right 

Also subscribe my youtube channel Code Site Industries to support me!

If you don't know how to play the game then you could look out in my channel ! It is my second nice game in pygame which I have developed ! Thank you for downloading!
